attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The british Military no longer recieves the kind of support it needs. It is involved in two major wars (Afghanistan, Iraq) and as auch should benefit from increased funds.
!!!!SUPPORT OUR TROOPS!!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "increase military funding."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14139.asp

Prime Minister's Office
